links.title: Apple May Already Have 'NFL Sunday Ticket' Deal
links.description: Apple's deal to stream live baseball games may pale in comparison to what comes next: The tech giant is reportedly close to securing a deal for "NFL Sunday Ticket." The deal for the out-of-market broadcast package is on the cusp of completion, according to Puck, with one source saying it's done already.

body:
@OptionsPlayers another great day at OP!!!! 
 
Steve had some great callouts for GOLD and LIFERS!!!! $AAPL $TSLA

$SPY $TSLA $AAPL $NVDA $BTC.X 

My thoughts on the mkt today  ... 

Just an extraordinary display of daytaders getting trapped on both the long and short side of the trade today. And while there were clear levels to watch for both rejections and bounces all day, most traders are using the wrong metrics and the algorithms are having a field day. For me, the multi-day ranges are much more identifiable to trade. 

In my Game Plan sent out to members yesterday, I laid out my top ten tips for how to navigate through these choppy mkts. Reading the move in Bitcoin was one and that certainly played out today. 

Most important earnings season in recent history coming up? Yep. Buckle up - the ride just started and we will need both seatbelts. 

✌️
$AAPL it’s going to be up tomorrow whether you like it or not. You just have to try and out guess those MM’s best you can.
$AAPL Lets c 168-169 tomorrow
$AAPL $DIS $TSLA it was a good Monday. The plays pay and chat is a goldmine.
